name: Shoot & Seek
description:
NOTE: Please set game to full screen!!!

On Halloween, a young girl named Brett was trick or treating in her neighborhood, when she heard that there was a legendary piece of candy called the Golden Candy Bar. Unfortunately this bar only shows up once a year, and is only found in a haunted mansion that's been abandoned for years. Determined to get that candy bar, Brett arms herself with trusty Derp 2000 and heads into the mansion, knowing full well the dangers that lie ahead. Will she be able to get the golden candy bar, or will she fall into defeat and despair?
